document_data.name: Temple of the Dawn
document_data.mainbody: The '''Temple of the Dawn''' was a temple to [[Lathander]] in [[Heliogabalus]].
document_data.Staff: [[Pavel Shemov]] had been an initiate from at least the early 1360s.{{cite dragon/327/The Silverfish|39}} The patriarch was [[Kovor Gemetsk]] from at least that time, until at least {{yearlink|1373}}.
document_data.Structure: The place had archives, and cloisters.{{cite book/The Rite|253|11}} It was a place of learning, if not the biggest temple in [[Damara]].{{cite book/The Rage|218|15}}
